main event: Multiple luminous spherical objects, approximately 12-15 feet in diameter, were observed maneuvering over a residence in Richmond, California for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were silvery-white in color and appeared to be under intelligent control.
The objects suddenly accelerated at incredible speed and disappeared from view.
A rare and intense electrical storm was in progress during the sighting, with storm clouds moving rapidly and reflecting moonlight.
The manager of the Morrison Planetarium observed two lights in the sky and believed the effect was created by the reflected moonlight through the lower cloud layers.
Other witnesses reported seeing a group of 15-20 small white 'stars' that were 'bouncing around' and disappearing/reappearing instantaneously for about 15 minutes.
sighted object: multiple luminous spherical objects, smaller white 'star-like' objects
witnesses: Mr. A.B. Mathews, Mr. Gates (Morrison Planetarium manager), other witnesses
